projects.name: Control Panel
projects.responsabilities: In this project I used Pentaho BI Suite to create some ETL's, then create the MySQL queries to generate some KPIs given by the client over the processed data and then show them in a Pentaho Dashboard, this Dashboard was integrated in a Liferay platform, I also worked in the automation of the execution of the ETL's processes (some were executed daily and some monthly) and the initial deployment of them.

projects.name: Database Integration
projects.technologies: BPA Taskcentre, SQL Server, MySQL, Python and Webservices
projects.responsabilities: I did almost everything in this project that consisted in an integration between the database of the clients ERP (Navision) with the database of his website (MySQL), so all the changes made in the client database are also made in the website database. To do that I used the BPA Taskcentre to manage the tasks that transfer the information from one database to the other. Depending on the entity to transfer I had to work with Webservices or Python Scripts

projects.name: Ethic Channel
projects.technologies: Python (Flask), Angular 6 and Google Cloud Platform (Cloud Storage, Firebase, Cloud Firestore, Google KMS)
projects.responsabilities: In this project I did little tasks both in backend and in frontend, however my main contribution was with the encryption of the complaints. This project consisted in an ethic channel where workers can report illicit activities anonymously.

projects.name: Migration of Oracle Forms
projects.technologies: Python (Flask), Angular 7, SQL Server, Docker and docker-compose
projects.responsabilities: This project consisted in the migration of Oracle Forms 6 to a more modern stack. I worked both in backend and in frontend I also was in charge to create the development environment with Docker and docker-compose, so all the developers would have the same environment and there were no dependency problems.

projects.name: Collaborative agendas
projects.technologies: Python (Flask), Angular 7, MySQL, Docker and docker-compose
projects.responsabilities: This project consisted in a Collaborative Agenda where promoters can promote events in a local government website. I worked both in backend and in frontend I also was in charge to create the development environment with Docker and docker-compose, so all the developers would have the same environment and there were no dependency problems. I was also in charge of the deployment of the application in the client server.

projects.name: C8
projects.technologies: Node, Kafka, Firebase, PostgreSQL, Docker and docker-compose
projects.responsabilities: My company asked me to implement a notification system for an application that was almost finished. The system included Kafka to pass messages between services and a Node server that had to made push notification to the users through Firebase. I created a development environment with Docker and orchestrate everythong with docker-compose. It consisted in a Kafka server with 3 nodes that can hold the replication and partition of topics, a PostgreSQL database, a Node server with a Producer and 3 Node Servers with Consumers.

projects.name: Google Data Studio Conectors
projects.responsabilities: In this project I implemented 3 Google Data Studio Connectors. The client already had the three of them for Tableau and I had to adapt the code for Google Data Studio.

projects.name: Tetsuki
projects.technologies: Python, Angular 4, Docker, Google Cloud Platform (Kubernettes, App Engine and Datastore)
projects.responsabilities: I worked in a project that collected tenders' information from public websites. I used a variety of languages and technologies such us: Python for the web scrappers and the server backend, Docker and Kubernettes to deploy the scrappers. Google App Engine Standard for the application, Google Datastore as database (latter on was changed to Elasticsearch and I did the migration of the database and all the api endpoints) and Angular 4 for the web client. I also wrote some unit and functional test in Python.

projects.name: Laureon
projects.technologies: Python (Django), Open Edx, Google Cloud Platform (Compute Engine)
projects.responsabilities: I deployed an online platform where my company offered courses. The chosen platform was Open Edx, and was deployed on Google Cloud Platform. I worked on the integration of Vimeo in the platform and on the website where the courses where sold, that was written in Python using the Django Framework.
